title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1160.19 - Fines
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1160.19 - Fines

State Regulations

Violation of any of the NFTA rules and regulations including
payment of the applicable fees shall constitute a transit infraction punishable
by the imposition by the transit adjudication bureau, established pursuant to
title 11-A, Niagara Frontier Transportation Authority of the Public Authorities

Law, of a civil penalty in an amount for any one violation not to exceed $250, exclusive of interest or costs assessed thereon, in accordance with a schedule
of such penalties as may from time to time be established by the NFTA. There
shall be no penalty or increment in fine by virtue of a respondent's timely
exercise of his right to a hearing or appeal. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
